title: 2007 Radio Disney Music Awards
text:
The 2007 <a href="Radio%20Disney%20Music%20Awards">Radio Disney Music Awards</a> were held on December 22, 2007, at the <a href="Radio%20Disney">Radio Disney</a>, <a href="Burbank%2C%20California">Burbank, California</a>. After this edition the awards started a hiatus of four years after the 2008 awards.
Production.
At that time the Radio Disney Music Awards wasn't an official ceremony but just a special edition on the <a href="Radio%20Disney">Radio Disney</a> broadcast and held on December 22, 2007. The Radio Disney Music Awards contained 15 categories, with 4 nominees for votes in 4 weeks.
Nominees and winners.
List of categories and winners in 2007.
